title: WTB S74 silks with paper backs
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: WTB S74 silks with paper backs
posts.post_content: I am looking to purchase S74 silks with paper backing. My want list is fairly short for ones I need or upgrades . Please let me know if you have any for sale or trade
I have 3 or 4 and I think one is graded EX, which is very high grade for them, as you know....can you put your want list out here?
